Question: Newegg Commerce, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Newegg Commerce, Inc.

Product Highlight:
- Newegg Commerce, Inc. is showcasing its e-commerce expertise as a 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) exhibitor.
- The company will host meetings with leading technology manufacturers and partners, aiming to better understand manufacturers’ retail needs and improve sales results for marketplace sellers.
- Newegg will participate in the "TikTok Shop: Live from CES 2024" event, showing deals on its TikTok channel.
- Newegg Media will create social media videos to showcase upcoming technology products.

Source:
https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240105730725/en/
Summary_cn:
新蛋电子商务有限公司

产品亮点：
- 新蛋电子商务有限公司作为2024国际消费电子展览会（CES）的参展商，展示其电子商务专业能力。
- 公司将与领先的技术制造商和合作伙伴举行会议，旨在更好地了解制造商的零售需求，并改善市场销售结果。
- 新蛋将参加“来自2024年CES的TikTok商店”活动，在其TikTok频道上展示优惠。
- 新蛋媒体将制作社交媒体视频，展示即将推出的技术产品。

来源：
https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240105730725/en/
